alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 6:31PM CDT until August 09 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Eastland County in north central Texas... Southwestern Stephens County in north central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 631 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moran, or 11 miles northwest of Cisco, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Eastland, Cisco, Gunsight, Lake Cisco, and Harpersville. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 335 and 339. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
